10473  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rrup
10474  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
10475  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
10476  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rrup
10477  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
10478  else
10479  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rrup
10480  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
10481  endif
10482 
10483 C Add Ztor term
10484  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
10485 
10486  sigma = 0.65
10487 
10488 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
10489  lny = lny + 4.6052
10490 
10491  period2 = period1
10492 
10493  return
10494  end
10495 
10496 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
10497  Subroutine dcpp_common003 ( m, Rrup, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
10498 
10499  implicit none
10500 
10501  integer MAXPER
10502  parameter(maxper=5)
10503  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
10504  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
10505  real Mref1, MRef2, Rrup, Ztor
10506  REAL M, specT, sigma
10507  REAL period2, lnY, period1, a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T
10508  REAL a7T, a8T, a9T
10509  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
10510 
10511  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
10512  data a0 / 4.26700257, 5.095267482, 5.118384786, 5.211651552, 4.753316415 /
10513  data a1 / -1.704621664, -1.521651883, -1.124676082, -1.008136391, -1.066098231 /
10514  data a2 / 1.667127313, 1.678459199, 2.142341158, 2.782649024, 3.084140079 /
10515  data a3 / -1.443434574, -1.316295438, -0.979791521, -1.025838031, -1.163722387 /
10516  data a4 / 0.314465134, 0.279948033, 0.308303208, 0.37704864, 0.468674542 /
10517  data a5 / -0.959040945, -0.928840584, -1.181350565, -1.346345473, -1.386584498 /
10518  data a6 / 0.313193998, 0.31169418, 0.225880131, 0.177047004, 0.177375041 /
10519  data a7 / 4.678293537, 4.795274716, 4.279893539, 3.987288865, 3.994487484 /
10520  data a8 / 0.002216998, 0.019973522, -0.002746898, 0.016238172, 0.011075769 /
10521  data a9 / 0.900833334, 0.843155253, 0.670101169, 0.60887657, 0.563006729 /
10522 
10523 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
10524  nper = 5
10525 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
10526  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
10527  period1 = period(1)
10528  a0t = a0(1)
10529  a1t = a1(1)
10530  a2t = a2(1)
10531  a3t = a3(1)
10532  a4t = a4(1)
10533  a5t = a5(1)
10534  a6t = a6(1)
10535  a7t = a7(1)
10536  a8t = a8(1)
10537  a9t = a9(1)
10538  goto 1011
10539  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
10540 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
10541  do i=2,nper-1
10542  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
10543  count1 = i
10544  count2 = i+1
10545  goto 1020
10546  endif
10547  enddo
10548  endif
10549 
10550 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
10551  write (*,*)
10552  write (*,*) 'DCPP Common Model003 Horizontal'
10553  write (*,*) 'attenuation model is not defined for a '
10554  write (*,*) ' spectral period of: '
10555  write (*,'(a10,f10.5)') ' Period = ',spect
10556  write (*,*) 'This spectral period is outside the defined'
10557  write (*,*) 'period range in the code or beyond the range'
10558  write (*,*) 'of spectral periods for interpolation.'
10559  write (*,*) 'Please check the input file.'
10560  write (*,*)
10561  stop 99
10562 
10563 C Interpolate the coefficients for the requested spectral period.
10564  1020 call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a0(count1),a0(count2),
10565  + spect,a0t,iflag)
10566  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a1(count1),a1(count2),
10567  + spect,a1t,iflag)
10568  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a2(count1),a2(count2),
10569  + spect,a2t,iflag)
10570  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a3(count1),a3(count2),
10571  + spect,a3t,iflag)
10572  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a4(count1),a4(count2),
10573  + spect,a4t,iflag)
10574  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a5(count1),a5(count2),
10575  + spect,a5t,iflag)
10576  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a6(count1),a6(count2),
10577  + spect,a6t,iflag)
10578  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a7(count1),a7(count2),
10579  + spect,a7t,iflag)
10580  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a8(count1),a8(count2),
10581  + spect,a8t,iflag)
10582  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a9(count1),a9(count2),
10583  + spect,a9t,iflag)
10584 
10585  1011 period1 = spect
10586 
10587 C Set Constant Terms
10588  mref1 = 5.5
10589  mref2 = 6.5
10590 
10591 C Compute the ground motion for the given spectral period.
10592  if (m .lt. mref1) then
10593  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rrup
10594  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
10595  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
10596  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rrup
10597  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
10598  else
10599  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rrup
10600  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
10601  endif
10602 
10603 C Add Ztor term
10604  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
10605 
10606  sigma = 0.65
10607 
10608 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
10609  lny = lny + 4.6052
10610 
10611  period2 = period1
10612 
10613  return
10614  end
10615 
10616 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
10617  Subroutine dcpp_common004 ( m, Rrup, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
10618 
10619  implicit none
10620 
10621  integer MAXPER
10622  parameter(maxper=5)
10623  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
10624  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
10625  real Mref1, MRef2, Rrup, Ztor
10626  REAL M, specT, sigma
10627  REAL period2, lnY, period1, a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T
10628  REAL a7T, a8T, a9T
10629  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
10630 
10631  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
10632  data a0 / 3.870448951, 4.887688516, 4.514455374, 3.759666642, 2.965961472 /
10633  data a1 / -0.51925764, -0.566344728, -0.598851191, -0.47011131, -0.380220056 /
10634  data a2 / 1.049735239, 1.176785404, 1.692430218, 1.998332708, 2.230755309 /
10635  data a3 / -0.56846325, -0.688829892, -0.761680651, -0.782804044, -0.842190919 /
10636  data a4 / 0.100423374, 0.119647883, 0.150583433, 0.175749332, 0.244812228 /
10637  data a5 / -1.144844546, -1.117581276, -1.135977587, -1.112790925, -1.12415614 /
10638  data a6 / 0.285692481, 0.243559626, 0.213316478, 0.200452585, 0.196677723 /
10639  data a7 / 6.479603934, 6.443720517, 6.325266942, 6.302213482, 6.465155083 /
10640  data a8 / -0.000334545, -0.006108207, -0.00544564, -0.001299281, 0.013815162 /
10641  data a9 / 0.754145633, 0.673525509, 0.51831709, 0.441346775, 0.394579793 /
10642 
10643 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
10644  nper = 5
10645 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
10646  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
10647  period1 = period(1)
10648  a0t = a0(1)
10649  a1t = a1(1)
10650  a2t = a2(1)
10651  a3t = a3(1)
10652  a4t = a4(1)
10653  a5t = a5(1)
10654  a6t = a6(1)
10655  a7t = a7(1)
10656  a8t = a8(1)
10657  a9t = a9(1)
10658  goto 1011
10659  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
10660 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
10661  do i=2,nper-1
10662  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
10663  count1 = i
10664  count2 = i+1
10665  goto 1020
10666  endif
10667  enddo
10668  endif
10669 
10670 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
10671  write (*,*)
10672  write (*,*) 'DCPP Common Model004 Horizontal'
10673  write (*,*) 'attenuation model is not defined for a '
10674  write (*,*) ' spectral period of: '
10675  write (*,'(a10,f10.5)') ' Period = ',spect
10676  write (*,*) 'This spectral period is outside the defined'
10677  write (*,*) 'period range in the code or beyond the range'
10678  write (*,*) 'of spectral periods for interpolation.'
10679  write (*,*) 'Please check the input file.'
10680  write (*,*)
10681  stop 99
10682 
10683 C Interpolate the coefficients for the requested spectral period.
10684  1020 call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a0(count1),a0(count2),
10685  + spect,a0t,iflag)
10686  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a1(count1),a1(count2),
10687  + spect,a1t,iflag)
10688  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a2(count1),a2(count2),
10689  + spect,a2t,iflag)
10690  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a3(count1),a3(count2),
10691  + spect,a3t,iflag)
10692  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a4(count1),a4(count2),
10693  + spect,a4t,iflag)
10694  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a5(count1),a5(count2),
10695  + spect,a5t,iflag)
10696  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a6(count1),a6(count2),
10697  + spect,a6t,iflag)
10698  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a7(count1),a7(count2),
10699  + spect,a7t,iflag)
10700  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a8(count1),a8(count2),
10701  + spect,a8t,iflag)
10702  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a9(count1),a9(count2),
10703  + spect,a9t,iflag)
10704 
10705  1011 period1 = spect
10706 
10707 C Set Constant Terms
10708  mref1 = 5.5
10709  mref2 = 6.5
10710 
10711 C Compute the ground motion for the given spectral period.
10712  if (m .lt. mref1) then
10713  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rrup
10714  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
10715  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
10716  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rrup
10717  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
10718  else
10719  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rrup
10720  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
10721  endif
10722 
10723 C Add Ztor term
10724  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
10725 
10726  sigma = 0.65
10727 
10728 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
10729  lny = lny + 4.6052
10730 
10731  period2 = period1
10732 
10733  return
10734  end
10735 
10736 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
10737  Subroutine dcpp_common005 ( m, Rrup, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
10738 
10739  implicit none
10740 
10741  integer MAXPER
10742  parameter(maxper=5)
10743  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
10744  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
10745  real Mref1, MRef2, Rrup, Ztor
10746  REAL M, specT, sigma
10747  REAL period2, lnY, period1, a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T
10748  REAL a7T, a8T, a9T
10749  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
10750 
10751  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
10752  data a0 / 3.493293094, 4.392226445, 3.95601353, 3.469189558, 2.770559363 /
10753  data a1 / -0.517413435, -0.538304154, -0.359381871, -0.29150999, -0.155053963 /
10754  data a2 / 1.16587349, 1.233499318, 1.462679511, 1.78422841, 2.068713002 /
10755  data a3 / -0.542730416, -0.627532626, -0.519420966, -0.525274929, -0.462301343 /
10756  data a4 / 0.107332105, 0.137442784, 0.15989904, 0.204782651, 0.241935468 /
10757  data a5 / -0.915960819, -0.900192462, -0.951585908, -0.971657293, -0.978575075 /
10758  data a6 / 0.251159906, 0.230060775, 0.205960024, 0.193677133, 0.184936972 /
10759  data a7 / 5.076184084, 5.414933339, 5.038544997, 4.787916605, 4.990588764 /
10760  data a8 / -0.006139721, -0.007045028, -0.003343442, -0.001995972, -0.001325647 /
10761  data a9 / 0.510976682, 0.462927961, 0.339345733, 0.262946907, 0.175755775 /
10762 
10763 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
10764  nper = 5
10765 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
10766  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
10767  period1 = period(1)
10768  a0t = a0(1)
10769  a1t = a1(1)
10770  a2t = a2(1)
10771  a3t = a3(1)
10772  a4t = a4(1)
10773  a5t = a5(1)
10774  a6t = a6(1)
10775  a7t = a7(1)
10776  a8t = a8(1)
10777  a9t = a9(1)
10778  goto 1011
10779  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
10780 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
10781  do i=2,nper-1
10782  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
10783  count1 = i
10784  count2 = i+1
10785  goto 1020
10786  endif
10787  enddo
10788  endif
10789 
10790 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
10791  write (*,*)
10792  write (*,*) 'DCPP Common Model005 Horizontal'
10793  write (*,*) 'attenuation model is not defined for a '
10794  write (*,*) ' spectral period of: '
10795  write (*,'(a10,f10.5)') ' Period = ',spect
10796  write (*,*) 'This spectral period is outside the defined'
10797  write (*,*) 'period range in the code or beyond the range'
10798  write (*,*) 'of spectral periods for interpolation.'
10799  write (*,*) 'Please check the input file.'
10800  write (*,*)
10801  stop 99
10802 
10803 C Interpolate the coefficients for the requested spectral period.
10804  1020 call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a0(count1),a0(count2),
10805  + spect,a0t,iflag)
10806  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a1(count1),a1(count2),
10807  + spect,a1t,iflag)
10808  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a2(count1),a2(count2),
10809  + spect,a2t,iflag)
10810  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a3(count1),a3(count2),
10811  + spect,a3t,iflag)
10812  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a4(count1),a4(count2),
10813  + spect,a4t,iflag)
10814  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a5(count1),a5(count2),
10815  + spect,a5t,iflag)
10816  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a6(count1),a6(count2),
10817  + spect,a6t,iflag)
10818  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a7(count1),a7(count2),
10819  + spect,a7t,iflag)
10820  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a8(count1),a8(count2),
10821  + spect,a8t,iflag)
10822  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a9(count1),a9(count2),
10823  + spect,a9t,iflag)
10824 
10825  1011 period1 = spect
10826 
10827 C Set Constant Terms
10828  mref1 = 5.5
10829  mref2 = 6.5
10830 
10831 C Compute the ground motion for the given spectral period.
10832  if (m .lt. mref1) then
10833  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rrup
10834  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
10835  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
10836  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rrup
10837  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
10838  else
10839  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rrup
10840  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
10841  endif
10842 
10843 C Add Ztor term
10844  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
10845 
10846  sigma = 0.65
10847 
10848 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
10849  lny = lny + 4.6052
10850 
10851  period2 = period1
10852 
10853  return
10854  end
10855 
10856 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
10857  Subroutine dcpp_common006 ( m, Rrup, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
10858 
10859  implicit none
10860 
10861  integer MAXPER
10862  parameter(maxper=5)
10863  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
10864  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
10865  real Mref1, MRef2, Rrup, Ztor
10866  REAL M, specT, sigma
10867  REAL period2, lnY, period1, a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T
10868  REAL a7T, a8T, a9T
10869  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
10870 
10871  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
10872  data a0 / 3.251986267, 3.79460145, 3.214007046, 3.209422039, 2.780584602 /
10873  data a1 / -0.721542295, -0.457987926, 0.020037702, 0.054457977, 0.18122608 /
10874  data a2 / 1.374150887, 1.392020089, 1.684354703, 2.200994674, 2.526765962 /
10875  data a3 / -0.807794369, -0.476751375, 0.070507552, 0.027081071, 0.095441379 /
10876  data a4 / 0.180764078, 0.089446403, 0.071159723, 0.149870046, 0.191762188 /
10877  data a5 / -0.707990675, -0.693619571, -0.844621479, -0.951687138, -1.00883522 /
10878  data a6 / 0.312388841, 0.29851607, 0.250933355, 0.222208685, 0.209970296 /
10879  data a7 / 3.449899465, 4.230785374, 3.077035349, 2.225207351, 2.277830296 /
10880  data a8 / 0.000738982, -0.016130082, 0.008913823, -0.009884652, -0.004823573 /
10881  data a9 / 0.867370117, 0.762878054, 0.489665039, 0.349411054, 0.166504883 /
10882 
10883 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
10884  nper = 5
10885 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
10886  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
10887  period1 = period(1)
10888  a0t = a0(1)
10889  a1t = a1(1)
10890  a2t = a2(1)
10891  a3t = a3(1)
10892  a4t = a4(1)
10893  a5t = a5(1)
10894  a6t = a6(1)
10895  a7t = a7(1)
10896  a8t = a8(1)
10897  a9t = a9(1)
10898  goto 1011
10899  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
10900 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
10901  do i=2,nper-1
10902  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
10903  count1 = i
10904  count2 = i+1
10905  goto 1020
10906  endif
10907  enddo
10908  endif
10909 
10910 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
10911  write (*,*)
10912  write (*,*) 'DCPP Common Model006 Horizontal'
10913  write (*,*) 'attenuation model is not defined for a '
10914  write (*,*) ' spectral period of: '
10915  write (*,'(a10,f10.5)') ' Period = ',spect
10916  write (*,*) 'This spectral period is outside the defined'
10917  write (*,*) 'period range in the code or beyond the range'
10918  write (*,*) 'of spectral periods for interpolation.'
10919  write (*,*) 'Please check the input file.'
10920  write (*,*)
10921  stop 99
10922 
10923 C Interpolate the coefficients for the requested spectral period.
10924  1020 call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a0(count1),a0(count2),
10925  + spect,a0t,iflag)
10926  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a1(count1),a1(count2),
10927  + spect,a1t,iflag)
10928  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a2(count1),a2(count2),
10929  + spect,a2t,iflag)
10930  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a3(count1),a3(count2),
10931  + spect,a3t,iflag)
10932  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a4(count1),a4(count2),
10933  + spect,a4t,iflag)
10934  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a5(count1),a5(count2),
10935  + spect,a5t,iflag)
10936  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a6(count1),a6(count2),
10937  + spect,a6t,iflag)
10938  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a7(count1),a7(count2),
10939  + spect,a7t,iflag)
10940  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a8(count1),a8(count2),
10941  + spect,a8t,iflag)
10942  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a9(count1),a9(count2),
10943  + spect,a9t,iflag)
10944 
10945  1011 period1 = spect
10946 
10947 C Set Constant Terms
10948  mref1 = 5.5
10949  mref2 = 6.5
10950 
10951 C Compute the ground motion for the given spectral period.
10952  if (m .lt. mref1) then
10953  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rrup
10954  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
10955  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
10956  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rrup
10957  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
10958  else
10959  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rrup
10960  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
10961  endif
10962 
10963 C Add Ztor term
10964  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
10965 
10966  sigma = 0.65
10967 
10968 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
10969  lny = lny + 4.6052
10970 
10971  period2 = period1
10972 
10973  return
10974  end
10975 
10976 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
10977  Subroutine dcpp_common007 ( m, Rrup, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
10978 
10979  implicit none
10980 
10981  integer MAXPER
10982  parameter(maxper=5)
10983  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
10984  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
10985  real Mref1, MRef2, Rrup, Ztor
10986  REAL M, specT, sigma
10987  REAL period2, lnY, period1, a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T
10988  REAL a7T, a8T, a9T
10989  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
10990 
10991  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
10992  data a0 / 3.522281793, 3.779815051, 3.790127509, 3.366254154, 2.993648492 /
10993  data a1 / -0.745505344, -0.802692452, -1.438293627, -1.680874156, -2.084533152 /
10994  data a2 / 0.04047644, 0.115820555, 0.731216267, 1.07504443, 1.388190912 /
10995  data a3 / -0.698386839, -0.543240211, -0.794857318, -1.012121099, -1.405991344 /
10996  data a4 / 0.241824727, 0.207003949, 0.333873833, 0.460081283, 0.575052544 /
10997  data a5 / -0.715813871, -0.609714344, -0.674005396, -0.652671853, -0.627627914 /
10998  data a6 / 0.202896307, 0.257134674, 0.198732616, 0.18934498, 0.221155607 /
10999  data a7 / 3.798280073, 3.661629505, 2.978961455, 2.769264077, 2.027250135 /
11000  data a8 / -0.02243076, -0.025143069, -0.013872542, -0.022910165, -0.012336009 /
11001  data a9 / 0.407627055, 0.395697911, 0.280057509, 0.164297046, 0.124698346 /
11002 
11003 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
11004  nper = 5
11005 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
11006  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
11007  period1 = period(1)
11008  a0t = a0(1)
11009  a1t = a1(1)
11010  a2t = a2(1)
11011  a3t = a3(1)
11012  a4t = a4(1)
11013  a5t = a5(1)
11014  a6t = a6(1)
11015  a7t = a7(1)
11016  a8t = a8(1)
11017  a9t = a9(1)
11018  goto 1011
11019  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
11020 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
11021  do i=2,nper-1
11022  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
11023  count1 = i
11024  count2 = i+1
11025  goto 1020
11026  endif
11027  enddo
11028  endif
11029 
11030 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
11031  write (*,*)
11032  write (*,*) 'DCPP Common Model007 Horizontal'
11033  write (*,*) 'attenuation model is not defined for a '
11034  write (*,*) ' spectral period of: '
11035  write (*,'(a10,f10.5)') ' Period = ',spect
11036  write (*,*) 'This spectral period is outside the defined'
11037  write (*,*) 'period range in the code or beyond the range'
11038  write (*,*) 'of spectral periods for interpolation.'
11039  write (*,*) 'Please check the input file.'
11040  write (*,*)
11041  stop 99
11042 
11043 C Interpolate the coefficients for the requested spectral period.
11044  1020 call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a0(count1),a0(count2),
11045  + spect,a0t,iflag)
11046  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a1(count1),a1(count2),
11047  + spect,a1t,iflag)
11048  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a2(count1),a2(count2),
11049  + spect,a2t,iflag)
11050  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a3(count1),a3(count2),
11051  + spect,a3t,iflag)
11052  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a4(count1),a4(count2),
11053  + spect,a4t,iflag)
11054  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a5(count1),a5(count2),
11055  + spect,a5t,iflag)
11056  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a6(count1),a6(count2),
11057  + spect,a6t,iflag)
11058  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a7(count1),a7(count2),
11059  + spect,a7t,iflag)
11060  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a8(count1),a8(count2),
11061  + spect,a8t,iflag)
11062  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a9(count1),a9(count2),
11063  + spect,a9t,iflag)
11064 
11065  1011 period1 = spect
11066 
11067 C Set Constant Terms
11068  mref1 = 5.5
11069  mref2 = 6.5
11070 
11071 C Compute the ground motion for the given spectral period.
11072  if (m .lt. mref1) then
11073  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rrup
11074  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
11075  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
11076  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rrup
11077  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
11078  else
11079  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rrup
11080  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
11081  endif
11082 
11083 C Add Ztor term
11084  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
11085 
11086  sigma = 0.65
11087 
11088 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
11089  lny = lny + 4.6052
11090 
11091  period2 = period1
11092 
11093  return
11094  end
11095 
11096 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
11097  Subroutine dcpp_common008 ( m, Rrup, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
11098 
11099  implicit none
11100 
11101  integer MAXPER
11102  parameter(maxper=5)
11103  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
11104  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
11105  real Mref1, MRef2, Rrup, Ztor
11106  REAL M, specT, sigma
11107  REAL period2, lnY, period1, a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T
11108  REAL a7T, a8T, a9T
11109  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
11110 
11111  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
11112  data a0 / 3.252954349, 3.26016395, 2.995497924, 2.902377492, 2.667079617 /
11113  data a1 / -0.667737691, -0.559316539, -0.921398892, -1.255008316, -1.437287148 /
11114  data a2 / 0.326501995, 0.355401061, 0.658464726, 1.036373301, 1.414567899 /
11115  data a3 / -0.659992815, -0.337970183, -0.276914155, -0.42718595, -0.626393327 /
11116  data a4 / 0.314873913, 0.197241241, 0.289814332, 0.419103558, 0.529254838 /
11117  data a5 / -0.456132241, -0.38443632, -0.4197599, -0.45562668, -0.46287412 /
11118  data a6 / 0.145043277, 0.178941179, 0.154732928, 0.149078213, 0.125423811 /
11119  data a7 / 2.266717573, 3.183447009, 1.416544689, 0.332686983, -0.208385792 /
11120  data a8 / -0.032599211, -0.005307832, -0.01490414, -0.01195826, -0.026117257 /
11121  data a9 / 0.163662802, 0.111881726, -0.051753846, -0.160656287, -0.253421932 /
11122 
11123 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
11124  nper = 5
11125 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
11126  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
11127  period1 = period(1)
11128  a0t = a0(1)
11129  a1t = a1(1)
11130  a2t = a2(1)
11131  a3t = a3(1)
11132  a4t = a4(1)
11133  a5t = a5(1)
11134  a6t = a6(1)
11135  a7t = a7(1)
11136  a8t = a8(1)
11137  a9t = a9(1)
11138  goto 1011
11139  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
11140 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
11141  do i=2,nper-1
11142  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
11143  count1 = i
11144  count2 = i+1
11145  goto 1020
11146  endif
11147  enddo
11148  endif
11149 
11150 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
11151  write (*,*)
11152  write (*,*) 'DCPP Common Model008 Horizontal'
11153  write (*,*) 'attenuation model is not defined for a '
11154  write (*,*) ' spectral period of: '
11155  write (*,'(a10,f10.5)') ' Period = ',spect
11156  write (*,*) 'This spectral period is outside the defined'
11157  write (*,*) 'period range in the code or beyond the range'
11158  write (*,*) 'of spectral periods for interpolation.'
11159  write (*,*) 'Please check the input file.'
11160  write (*,*)
11161  stop 99
11162 
11163 C Interpolate the coefficients for the requested spectral period.
11164  1020 call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a0(count1),a0(count2),
11165  + spect,a0t,iflag)
11166  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a1(count1),a1(count2),
11167  + spect,a1t,iflag)
11168  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a2(count1),a2(count2),
11169  + spect,a2t,iflag)
11170  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a3(count1),a3(count2),
11171  + spect,a3t,iflag)
11172  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a4(count1),a4(count2),
11173  + spect,a4t,iflag)
11174  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a5(count1),a5(count2),
11175  + spect,a5t,iflag)
11176  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a6(count1),a6(count2),
11177  + spect,a6t,iflag)
11178  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a7(count1),a7(count2),
11179  + spect,a7t,iflag)
11180  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a8(count1),a8(count2),
11181  + spect,a8t,iflag)
11182  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a9(count1),a9(count2),
11183  + spect,a9t,iflag)
11184 
11185  1011 period1 = spect
11186 
11187 C Set Constant Terms
11188  mref1 = 5.5
11189  mref2 = 6.5
11190 
11191 C Compute the ground motion for the given spectral period.
11192  if (m .lt. mref1) then
11193  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rrup
11194  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
11195  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
11196  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rrup
11197  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
11198  else
11199  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rrup
11200  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
11201  endif
11202 
11203 C Add Ztor term
11204  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
11205 
11206  sigma = 0.65
11207 
11208 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
11209  lny = lny + 4.6052
11210 
11211  period2 = period1
11212 
11213  return
11214  end
11215 
11216 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
11217  Subroutine dcpp_common009 ( m, Rrup, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
11218 
11219  implicit none
11220 
11221  integer MAXPER
11222  parameter(maxper=5)
11223  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
11224  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
11225  real Mref1, MRef2, Rrup, Ztor
11226  REAL M, specT, sigma
11227  REAL period2, lnY, period1, a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T
11228  REAL a7T, a8T, a9T
11229  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
11230 
11231  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
11232  data a0 / 2.87957963, 3.267451272, 2.934459189, 2.807261175, 2.375468933 /
11233  data a1 / -0.340091418, -0.264153471, 0.007822577, -0.055582518, -0.096382979 /
11234  data a2 / 0.877599706, 0.908074957, 1.278377881, 1.753596622, 2.11630298 /
11235  data a3 / -0.385424946, -0.240541882, 0.179140064, 0.081707406, 0.00501884 /
11236  data a4 / 0.132715693, 0.074441917, 0.072453275, 0.178176928, 0.250392558 /
11237  data a5 / -0.645626944, -0.585940757, -0.722451475, -0.790354398, -0.839573127 /
11238  data a6 / 0.257842701, 0.277186164, 0.230779667, 0.213220683, 0.185367497 /
11239  data a7 / 3.109921833, 3.427837094, 2.705180991, 2.239119649, 2.00539171 /
11240  data a8 / -0.005268259, -0.013346038, 2.40106e-05, -0.017669574, -0.01293008 /
11241  data a9 / 0.367840808, 0.329691579, 0.233494917, 0.151155273, 0.106584807 /
11242 
11243 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
11244  nper = 5
11245 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
11246  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
11247  period1 = period(1)
11248  a0t = a0(1)
11249  a1t = a1(1)
11250  a2t = a2(1)
11251  a3t = a3(1)
11252  a4t = a4(1)
11253  a5t = a5(1)
11254  a6t = a6(1)
11255  a7t = a7(1)
11256  a8t = a8(1)
11257  a9t = a9(1)
11258  goto 1011
11259  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
11260 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
11261  do i=2,nper-1
11262  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
11263  count1 = i
11264  count2 = i+1
11265  goto 1020
11266  endif
11267  enddo
11268  endif
11269 
11270 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
11271  write (*,*)
11272  write (*,*) 'DCPP Common Model009 Horizontal'
11273  write (*,*) 'attenuation model is not defined for a '
11274  write (*,*) ' spectral period of: '
11275  write (*,'(a10,f10.5)') ' Period = ',spect
11276  write (*,*) 'This spectral period is outside the defined'
11277  write (*,*) 'period range in the code or beyond the range'
11278  write (*,*) 'of spectral periods for interpolation.'
11279  write (*,*) 'Please check the input file.'
11280  write (*,*)
11281  stop 99
11282 
11283 C Interpolate the coefficients for the requested spectral period.
11284  1020 call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a0(count1),a0(count2),
11285  + spect,a0t,iflag)
11286  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a1(count1),a1(count2),
11287  + spect,a1t,iflag)
11288  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a2(count1),a2(count2),
11289  + spect,a2t,iflag)
11290  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a3(count1),a3(count2),
11291  + spect,a3t,iflag)
11292  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a4(count1),a4(count2),
11293  + spect,a4t,iflag)
11294  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a5(count1),a5(count2),
11295  + spect,a5t,iflag)
11296  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a6(count1),a6(count2),
11297  + spect,a6t,iflag)
11298  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a7(count1),a7(count2),
11299  + spect,a7t,iflag)
11300  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a8(count1),a8(count2),
11301  + spect,a8t,iflag)
11302  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a9(count1),a9(count2),
11303  + spect,a9t,iflag)
11304 
11305  1011 period1 = spect
11306 
11307 C Set Constant Terms
11308  mref1 = 5.5
11309  mref2 = 6.5
11310 
11311 C Compute the ground motion for the given spectral period.
11312  if (m .lt. mref1) then
11313  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rrup
11314  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
11315  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
11316  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rrup
11317  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
11318  else
11319  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rrup
11320  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rrup*rrup))
11321  endif
11322 
11323 C Add Ztor term
11324  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
11325 
11326  sigma = 0.65
11327 
11328 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
11329  lny = lny + 4.6052
11330 
11331  period2 = period1
11332 
11333  return
11334  end
11335 
11336 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
11337  Subroutine pvngs_commonask ( m, Rjb, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
11338 
11339  implicit none
11340 
11341  integer MAXPER
11342  parameter(maxper=5)
11343 
11344  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
11345  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
11346  real Mref1, MRef2, Rjb, Ztor
11347  REAL M, specT, sigma
11348  REAL period2, lnY, period1, a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T
11349  REAL a7T, a8T, a9T
11350  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
11351 
11352  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
11353  data a0 / 3.343907904, 4.252801795, 3.566737128, 2.938042573, 2.075468023 /
11354  data a1 / 0.080811823, 0.084210319, 0.073042473, 0.054685714, -0.009824295 /
11355  data a2 / 0.865947735, 0.963370266, 1.190967949, 1.48365227, 1.666544209 /
11356  data a3 / -0.095339756, -0.092834299, -0.104891355, -0.124136064, -0.185838727 /
11357  data a4 / 0.007702263, 0.021973272, 0.055388872, 0.098374638, 0.125433795 /
11358  data a5 / -1.0769308, -1.076935123, -1.063802868, -1.044096653, -0.994797979 /
11359  data a6 / 0.244690771, 0.244690839, 0.249686531, 0.257157478, 0.275708113 /
11360  data a7 / 5.086963275, 5.08699764, 5.066192565, 5.034072914, 4.948704972 /
11361  data a8 / -0.002933616, -0.004333507, 0.000807676, 0.001118967, 0.000744735 /
11362  data a9 / 1.080088531, 1.080087809, 0.821269279, 0.553048997, 0.297539821 /
11363 
11364 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
11365  nper = 5
11366 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
11367  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
11368  period1 = period(1)
11369  a0t = a0(1)
11370  a1t = a1(1)
11371  a2t = a2(1)
11372  a3t = a3(1)
11373  a4t = a4(1)
11374  a5t = a5(1)
11375  a6t = a6(1)
11376  a7t = a7(1)
11377  a8t = a8(1)
11378  a9t = a9(1)
11379  goto 1011
11380  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
11381 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
11382  do i=2,nper-1
11383  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
11384  count1 = i
11385  count2 = i+1
11386  goto 1020
11387  endif
11388  enddo
11389  endif
11390 
11391 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
11392  write (*,*)
11393  write (*,*) 'PVNGS Common Model ASK Horizontal'
11394  write (*,*) 'attenuation model is not defined for a '
11395  write (*,*) ' spectral period of: '
11396  write (*,'(a10,f10.5)') ' Period = ',spect
11397  write (*,*) 'This spectral period is outside the defined'
11398  write (*,*) 'period range in the code or beyond the range'
11399  write (*,*) 'of spectral periods for interpolation.'
11400  write (*,*) 'Please check the input file.'
11401  write (*,*)
11402  stop 99
11403 
11404 C Interpolate the coefficients for the requested spectral period.
11405  1020 call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a0(count1),a0(count2),
11406  + spect,a0t,iflag)
11407  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a1(count1),a1(count2),
11408  + spect,a1t,iflag)
11409  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a2(count1),a2(count2),
11410  + spect,a2t,iflag)
11411  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a3(count1),a3(count2),
11412  + spect,a3t,iflag)
11413  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a4(count1),a4(count2),
11414  + spect,a4t,iflag)
11415  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a5(count1),a5(count2),
11416  + spect,a5t,iflag)
11417  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a6(count1),a6(count2),
11418  + spect,a6t,iflag)
11419  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a7(count1),a7(count2),
11420  + spect,a7t,iflag)
11421  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a8(count1),a8(count2),
11422  + spect,a8t,iflag)
11423  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a9(count1),a9(count2),
11424  + spect,a9t,iflag)
11425 
11426  1011 period1 = spect
11427 
11428 C Set Constant Terms
11429  mref1 = 5.5
11430  mref2 = 6.5
11431 
11432 C Compute the ground motion for the given spectral period.
11433  if (m .lt. mref1) then
11434  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rjb
11435  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
11436  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
11437  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
11438  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
11439  else
11440  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
11441  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
11442  endif
11443 
11444 C Add Ztor term
11445  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
11446 
11447  sigma = 0.65
11448 
11449 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
11450  lny = lny + 4.6052
11451 
11452  period2 = period1
11453 
11454  return
11455  end
11456 
11457 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
11458  Subroutine pvngs_commonbindi ( m, Rjb, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
11459 
11460  implicit none
11461 
11462  integer MAXPER
11463  parameter(maxper=5)
11464  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
11465  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
11466  real Mref1, MRef2, Rjb, Ztor
11467  REAL M, specT, sigma
11468  REAL period2, lnY, period1, a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T
11469  REAL a7T, a8T, a9T
11470  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
11471 
11472  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
11473  data a0 / 5.477789171, 6.506273744, 5.14623719, 3.78029147, 2.717755816 /
11474  data a1 / -0.232825243, -0.233689039, -0.207289509, -0.187375433, -0.172650217 /
11475  data a2 / 0.947285157, 0.993453424, 1.388735997, 1.706872295, 2.012465488 /
11476  data a3 / -0.472012097, -0.472300013, -0.454726948, -0.441602562, -0.431571518 /
11477  data a4 / 0.000692252, 0.007293516, 0.066040163, 0.113273155, 0.158347203 /
11478  data a5 / -1.94765912, -2.022422359, -1.632894927, -1.342400966, -1.200172069 /
11479  data a6 / 0.369759727, 0.370933284, 0.364894114, 0.360547331, 0.358487482 /
11480  data a7 / 8.119918051, 8.113741035, 8.150754423, 8.188080348, 8.210408959 /
11481  data a8 / 0.015925715, 0.016487051, 0.01355982, 0.011369528, 0.010293092 /
11482  data a9 / 0.622838681, 0.645423299, 0.527834946, 0.440359475, 0.397648621 /
11483 
11484 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
11485  nper = 5
11486 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
11487  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
11488  period1 = period(1)
11489  a0t = a0(1)
11490  a1t = a1(1)
11491  a2t = a2(1)
11492  a3t = a3(1)
11493  a4t = a4(1)
11494  a5t = a5(1)
11495  a6t = a6(1)
11496  a7t = a7(1)
11497  a8t = a8(1)
11498  a9t = a9(1)
11499  goto 1011
11500  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
11501 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
11502  do i=2,nper-1
11503  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
11504  count1 = i
11505  count2 = i+1
11506  goto 1020
11507  endif
11508  enddo
11509  endif
11510 
11511 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
11512  write (*,*)
11513  write (*,*) 'PVNGS Common Model Bindi Horizontal'
11514  write (*,*) 'attenuation model is not defined for a '
11515  write (*,*) ' spectral period of: '
11516  write (*,'(a10,f10.5)') ' Period = ',spect
11517  write (*,*) 'This spectral period is outside the defined'
11518  write (*,*) 'period range in the code or beyond the range'
11519  write (*,*) 'of spectral periods for interpolation.'
11520  write (*,*) 'Please check the input file.'
11521  write (*,*)
11522  stop 99
11523 
11524 C Interpolate the coefficients for the requested spectral period.
11525  1020 call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a0(count1),a0(count2),
11526  + spect,a0t,iflag)
11527  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a1(count1),a1(count2),
11528  + spect,a1t,iflag)
11529  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a2(count1),a2(count2),
11530  + spect,a2t,iflag)
11531  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a3(count1),a3(count2),
11532  + spect,a3t,iflag)
11533  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a4(count1),a4(count2),
11534  + spect,a4t,iflag)
11535  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a5(count1),a5(count2),
11536  + spect,a5t,iflag)
11537  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a6(count1),a6(count2),
11538  + spect,a6t,iflag)
11539  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a7(count1),a7(count2),
11540  + spect,a7t,iflag)
11541  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a8(count1),a8(count2),
11542  + spect,a8t,iflag)
11543  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a9(count1),a9(count2),
11544  + spect,a9t,iflag)
11545 
11546  1011 period1 = spect
11547 
11548 C Set Constant Terms
11549  mref1 = 5.5
11550  mref2 = 6.5
11551 
11552 C Compute the ground motion for the given spectral period.
11553  if (m .lt. mref1) then
11554  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rjb
11555  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
11556  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
11557  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
11558  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
11559  else
11560  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
11561  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
11562  endif
11563 
11564 C Add Ztor term
11565  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
11566 
11567  sigma = 0.65
11568 
11569 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
11570  lny = lny + 4.6052
11571 
11572  period2 = period1
11573 
11574  return
11575  end
11576 
11577 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
11578  Subroutine pvngs_common001 ( m, Rjb, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
11579 
11580  implicit none
11581 
11582  integer MAXPER
11583  parameter(maxper=5)
11584  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
11585  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
11586  real Mref1, MRef2, Rjb, Ztor, period1
11587  REAL M, specT, sigma
11588  REAL period2, lnY, a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T, a7T
11589  REAL a8T, a9T
11590  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
11591 
11592  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
11593  data a0 / 3.359674285, 2.999532571, 2.513715574, 1.550253211, 0.481805389 /
11594  data a1 / 0.259051103, 1.806534394, 1.457260206, 2.145567828, 2.423955513 /
11595  data a2 / 1.29166876, 1.509755983, 1.5523006, 1.811610628, 2.00622729 /
11596  data a3 / -0.046432184, 1.164786842, 0.916676151, 1.378670837, 1.443426906 /
11597  data a4 / 0.051915891, -0.220276726, -0.156106833, -0.278186332, -0.324826277 /
11598  data a5 / -0.944987414, -0.916703744, -0.928962513, -0.99079302, -0.933204263 /
11599  data a6 / 0.157927576, 0.075356957, 0.114199324, 0.149706685, 0.176127245 /
11600  data a7 / 4.546890862, 5.237645969, 4.367579105, 3.897887087, 4.288293044 /
11601  data a8 / 0.00797077, -0.013157019, -0.013825852, 0.001092373, -0.017732395 /
11602  data a9 / 1.48171669, 1.324991739, 0.837728298, 0.463713454, 0.034077117 /
11603 
11604 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
11605  nper = 5
11606 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
11607  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
11608  period1 = period(1)
11609  a0t = a0(1)
11610  a1t = a1(1)
11611  a2t = a2(1)
11612  a3t = a3(1)
11613  a4t = a4(1)
11614  a5t = a5(1)
11615  a6t = a6(1)
11616  a7t = a7(1)
11617  a8t = a8(1)
11618  a9t = a9(1)
11619  goto 1011
11620  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
11621 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
11622  do i=2,nper-1
11623  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
11624  count1 = i
11625  count2 = i+1
11626  goto 1020
11627  endif
11628  enddo
11629  endif
11630 
11631 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
11632  write (*,*)
11633  write (*,*) 'PVNGS Common Model001 Horizontal'
11634  write (*,*) 'attenuation model is not defined for a '
11635  write (*,*) ' spectral period of: '
11636  write (*,'(a10,f10.5)') ' Period = ',spect
11637  write (*,*) 'This spectral period is outside the defined'
11638  write (*,*) 'period range in the code or beyond the range'
11639  write (*,*) 'of spectral periods for interpolation.'
11640  write (*,*) 'Please check the input file.'
11641  write (*,*)
11642  stop 99
11643 
11644 C Interpolate the coefficients for the requested spectral period.
11645  1020 call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a0(count1),a0(count2),
11646  + spect,a0t,iflag)
11647  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a1(count1),a1(count2),
11648  + spect,a1t,iflag)
11649  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a2(count1),a2(count2),
11650  + spect,a2t,iflag)
11651  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a3(count1),a3(count2),
11652  + spect,a3t,iflag)
11653  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a4(count1),a4(count2),
11654  + spect,a4t,iflag)
11655  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a5(count1),a5(count2),
11656  + spect,a5t,iflag)
11657  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a6(count1),a6(count2),
11658  + spect,a6t,iflag)
11659  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a7(count1),a7(count2),
11660  + spect,a7t,iflag)
11661  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a8(count1),a8(count2),
11662  + spect,a8t,iflag)
11663  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a9(count1),a9(count2),
11664  + spect,a9t,iflag)
11665 
11666  1011 period1 = spect
11667 
11668 C Set Constant Terms
11669  mref1 = 5.5
11670  mref2 = 6.5
11671 
11672 C Compute the ground motion for the given spectral period.
11673  if (m .lt. mref1) then
11674  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rjb
11675  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
11676  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
11677  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
11678  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
11679  else
11680  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
11681  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
11682  endif
11683 
11684 C Add Ztor term
11685  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
11686 
11687  sigma = 0.65
11688 
11689 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
11690  lny = lny + 4.6052
11691 
11692  period2 = period1
11693 
11694  return
11695  end
11696 
11697 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
11698  Subroutine pvngs_common002 ( m, Rjb, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
11699 
11700  implicit none
11701 
11702  integer MAXPER
11703  parameter(maxper=5)
11704  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
11705  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
11706  real Mref1, MRef2, Rjb, Ztor
11707  REAL M, specT, sigma
11708  REAL period2, lnY, period1, a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T
11709  REAL a7T, a8T, a9T
11710  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
11711 
11712  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
11713  data a0 / 4.469511159, 4.669919592, 5.026559877, 4.778429922, 3.674178555 /
11714  data a1 / -1.016050665, -0.318336897, -0.908739603, -0.913573926, -1.233112887 /
11715  data a2 / 0.611821156, 0.695479803, 1.376384997, 1.736252026, 1.937118833 /
11716  data a3 / -0.846562333, -0.218552638, -0.695414516, -0.818961659, -1.177798878 /
11717  data a4 / 0.138947695, 0.0526643, 0.263814563, 0.347699478, 0.393435099 /
11718  data a5 / -1.393924555, -1.299071436, -1.390369351, -1.424281402, -1.253137814 /
11719  data a6 / 0.333692768, 0.259002892, 0.209262158, 0.210308355, 0.28659741 /
11720  data a7 / 5.411275966, 5.16809154, 4.78359839, 4.869260987, 4.582358809 /
11721  data a8 / 0.013271239, 0.009010653, 0.000198032, 0.012491114, -0.002793928 /
11722  data a9 / 0.728099195, 0.757419119, 0.75456221, 0.670391643, 0.585756882 /
11723 
11724 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
11725  nper = 5
11726 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
11727  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
11728  period1 = period(1)
11729  a0t = a0(1)
11730  a1t = a1(1)
11731  a2t = a2(1)
11732  a3t = a3(1)
11733  a4t = a4(1)
11734  a5t = a5(1)
11735  a6t = a6(1)
11736  a7t = a7(1)
11737  a8t = a8(1)
11738  a9t = a9(1)
11739  goto 1011
11740  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
11741 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
11742  do i=2,nper-1
11743  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
11744  count1 = i
11745  count2 = i+1
11746  goto 1020
11747  endif
11748  enddo
11749  endif
11750 
11751 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
11752  write (*,*)
11753  write (*,*) 'PVNGS Common Model002 Horizontal'
11754  write (*,*) 'attenuation model is not defined for a '
11755  write (*,*) ' spectral period of: '
11756  write (*,'(a10,f10.5)') ' Period = ',spect
11757  write (*,*) 'This spectral period is outside the defined'
11758  write (*,*) 'period range in the code or beyond the range'
11759  write (*,*) 'of spectral periods for interpolation.'
11760  write (*,*) 'Please check the input file.'
11761  write (*,*)
11762  stop 99
11763 
11764 C Interpolate the coefficients for the requested spectral period.
11765  1020 call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a0(count1),a0(count2),
11766  + spect,a0t,iflag)
11767  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a1(count1),a1(count2),
11768  + spect,a1t,iflag)
11769  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a2(count1),a2(count2),
11770  + spect,a2t,iflag)
11771  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a3(count1),a3(count2),
11772  + spect,a3t,iflag)
11773  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a4(count1),a4(count2),
11774  + spect,a4t,iflag)
11775  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a5(count1),a5(count2),
11776  + spect,a5t,iflag)
11777  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a6(count1),a6(count2),
11778  + spect,a6t,iflag)
11779  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a7(count1),a7(count2),
11780  + spect,a7t,iflag)
11781  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a8(count1),a8(count2),
11782  + spect,a8t,iflag)
11783  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a9(count1),a9(count2),
11784  + spect,a9t,iflag)
11785 
11786  1011 period1 = spect
11787 
11788 C Set Constant Terms
11789  mref1 = 5.5
11790  mref2 = 6.5
11791 
11792 C Compute the ground motion for the given spectral period.
11793  if (m .lt. mref1) then
11794  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rjb
11795  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
11796  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
11797  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
11798  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
11799  else
11800  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
11801  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
11802  endif
11803 
11804 C Add Ztor term
11805  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
11806 
11807  sigma = 0.65
11808 
11809 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
11810  lny = lny + 4.6052
11811 
11812  period2 = period1
11813 
11814  return
11815  end
11816 
11817 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
11818  Subroutine pvngs_common003 ( m, Rjb, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
11819 
11820  implicit none
11821 
11822  integer MAXPER
11823  parameter(maxper=5)
11824  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
11825  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
11826  real Mref1, MRef2, Rjb, Ztor
11827  REAL M, specT, sigma, period1
11828  REAL period2, lnY, a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T, a7T
11829  REAL a8T, a9T
11830  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
11831 
11832  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
11833  data a0 / 3.875846016, 4.604039829, 5.09888582, 5.595457504, 4.923491709 /
11834  data a1 / -0.685741648, -0.282098998, -0.628985504, -1.142972715, -1.166258938 /
11835  data a2 / 1.777102049, 1.867105674, 2.267095367, 2.639663451, 2.958850385 /
11836  data a3 / -0.680100533, -0.339853919, -0.618838767, -1.181973274, -1.446096257 /
11837  data a4 / 0.162748119, 0.136429136, 0.247497324, 0.452750546, 0.503902043 /
11838  data a5 / -1.167243929, -1.100854485, -1.318943697, -1.464731932, -1.402028153 /
11839  data a6 / 0.23549403, 0.097212295, 0.063363647, 0.055289666, 0.08840652 /
11840  data a7 / 5.070646018, 5.620542857, 4.75940936, 4.41599181, 4.992410748 /
11841  data a8 / 0.005927228, -0.004610289, -0.006873191, -0.007525715, -0.007884014 /
11842  data a9 / 1.090435535, 0.865707921, 0.591183399, 0.492594083, 0.367542158 /
11843 
11844 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
11845  nper = 5
11846 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
11847  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
11848  period1 = period(1)
11849  a0t = a0(1)
11850  a1t = a1(1)
11851  a2t = a2(1)
11852  a3t = a3(1)
11853  a4t = a4(1)
11854  a5t = a5(1)
11855  a6t = a6(1)
11856  a7t = a7(1)
11857  a8t = a8(1)
11858  a9t = a9(1)
11859  goto 1011
11860  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
11861 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
11862  do i=2,nper-1
11863  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
11864  count1 = i
11865  count2 = i+1
11866  goto 1020
11867  endif
11868  enddo
11869  endif
11870 
11871 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
11872  write (*,*)
11873  write (*,*) 'PVNGS Common Model003 Horizontal'
11874  write (*,*) 'attenuation model is not defined for a '
11875  write (*,*) ' spectral period of: '
11876  write (*,'(a10,f10.5)') ' Period = ',spect
11877  write (*,*) 'This spectral period is outside the defined'
11878  write (*,*) 'period range in the code or beyond the range'
11879  write (*,*) 'of spectral periods for interpolation.'
11880  write (*,*) 'Please check the input file.'
11881  write (*,*)
11882  stop 99
11883 
11884 C Interpolate the coefficients for the requested spectral period.
11885  1020 call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a0(count1),a0(count2),
11886  + spect,a0t,iflag)
11887  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a1(count1),a1(count2),
11888  + spect,a1t,iflag)
11889  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a2(count1),a2(count2),
11890  + spect,a2t,iflag)
11891  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a3(count1),a3(count2),
11892  + spect,a3t,iflag)
11893  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a4(count1),a4(count2),
11894  + spect,a4t,iflag)
11895  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a5(count1),a5(count2),
11896  + spect,a5t,iflag)
11897  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a6(count1),a6(count2),
11898  + spect,a6t,iflag)
11899  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a7(count1),a7(count2),
11900  + spect,a7t,iflag)
11901  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a8(count1),a8(count2),
11902  + spect,a8t,iflag)
11903  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a9(count1),a9(count2),
11904  + spect,a9t,iflag)
11905 
11906  1011 period1 = spect
11907 
11908 C Set Constant Terms
11909  mref1 = 5.5
11910  mref2 = 6.5
11911 
11912 C Compute the ground motion for the given spectral period.
11913  if (m .lt. mref1) then
11914  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rjb
11915  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
11916  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
11917  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
11918  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
11919  else
11920  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
11921  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
11922  endif
11923 
11924 C Add Ztor term
11925  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
11926 
11927  sigma = 0.65
11928 
11929 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
11930  lny = lny + 4.6052
11931 
11932  period2 = period1
11933 
11934  return
11935  end
11936 
11937 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
11938  Subroutine pvngs_common004 ( m, Rjb, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
11939 
11940  implicit none
11941 
11942  integer MAXPER
11943  parameter(maxper=5)
11944  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
11945  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
11946  real Mref1, MRef2, Rjb, Ztor
11947  REAL M, specT, sigma
11948  REAL period2, lnY, period1, a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T
11949  REAL a7T, a8T, a9T
11950  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
11951 
11952  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
11953  data a0 / 3.831573393, 2.035301483, 2.680210979, 2.127825912, 0.975642192 /
11954  data a1 / -0.505892635, 2.517527172, 1.235975612, 1.701487361, 1.527531384 /
11955  data a2 / 0.66723769, 0.95917924, 1.451925977, 1.791003984, 1.951961942 /
11956  data a3 / -0.527776405, 1.898778895, 0.992018092, 1.260611637, 0.908347556 /
11957  data a4 / 0.181773916, -0.422365062, -0.160859691, -0.190827403, -0.159870762 /
11958  data a5 / -1.055947659, -0.928049678, -1.026069961, -1.138189325, -0.96732317 /
11959  data a6 / 0.223345863, 0.11253287, 0.12542901, 0.13800759, 0.224458062 /
11960  data a7 / 4.239531292, 4.503190993, 3.46568974, 3.149501089, 3.044427493 /
11961  data a8 / -0.01950985, 0.00447459, -0.000860926, 0.003015036, -0.01290382 /
11962  data a9 / 1.300744622, 1.170906174, 0.870374403, 0.596846482, 0.300315471 /
11963 
11964 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
11965  nper = 5
11966 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
11967  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
11968  period1 = period(1)
11969  a0t = a0(1)
11970  a1t = a1(1)
11971  a2t = a2(1)
11972  a3t = a3(1)
11973  a4t = a4(1)
11974  a5t = a5(1)
11975  a6t = a6(1)
11976  a7t = a7(1)
11977  a8t = a8(1)
11978  a9t = a9(1)
11979  goto 1011
11980  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
11981 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
11982  do i=2,nper-1
11983  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
11984  count1 = i
11985  count2 = i+1
11986  goto 1020
11987  endif
11988  enddo
11989  endif
11990 
11991 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
11992  write (*,*)
11993  write (*,*) 'PVNGS Common Model004 Horizontal'
11994  write (*,*) 'attenuation model is not defined for a '
11995  write (*,*) ' spectral period of: '
11996  write (*,'(a10,f10.5)') ' Period = ',spect
11997  write (*,*) 'This spectral period is outside the defined'
11998  write (*,*) 'period range in the code or beyond the range'
11999  write (*,*) 'of spectral periods for interpolation.'
12000  write (*,*) 'Please check the input file.'
12001  write (*,*)
12002  stop 99
12003 
12004 C Interpolate the coefficients for the requested spectral period.
12005  1020 call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a0(count1),a0(count2),
12006  + spect,a0t,iflag)
12007  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a1(count1),a1(count2),
12008  + spect,a1t,iflag)
12009  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a2(count1),a2(count2),
12010  + spect,a2t,iflag)
12011  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a3(count1),a3(count2),
12012  + spect,a3t,iflag)
12013  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a4(count1),a4(count2),
12014  + spect,a4t,iflag)
12015  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a5(count1),a5(count2),
12016  + spect,a5t,iflag)
12017  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a6(count1),a6(count2),
12018  + spect,a6t,iflag)
12019  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a7(count1),a7(count2),
12020  + spect,a7t,iflag)
12021  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a8(count1),a8(count2),
12022  + spect,a8t,iflag)
12023  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a9(count1),a9(count2),
12024  + spect,a9t,iflag)
12025 
12026  1011 period1 = spect
12027 
12028 C Set Constant Terms
12029  mref1 = 5.5
12030  mref2 = 6.5
12031 
12032 C Compute the ground motion for the given spectral period.
12033  if (m .lt. mref1) then
12034  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rjb
12035  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
12036  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
12037  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
12038  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
12039  else
12040  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
12041  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
12042  endif
12043 
12044 C Add Ztor term
12045  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
12046 
12047  sigma = 0.65
12048 
12049 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
12050  lny = lny + 4.6052
12051 
12052  period2 = period1
12053 
12054  return
12055  end
12056 
12057 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
12058  Subroutine pvngs_common005 ( m, Rjb, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
12059 
12060  implicit none
12061 
12062  integer MAXPER
12063  parameter(maxper=5)
12064  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
12065  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
12066  real Mref1, MRef2, Rjb, Ztor
12067  REAL M, specT, sigma
12068  REAL period2, lnY, period1, a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T
12069  REAL a7T, a8T, a9T
12070  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
12071 
12072  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
12073  data a0 / 4.305480459, 5.832489255, 5.193434708, 4.707772707, 3.781149495 /
12074  data a1 / -0.360669872, -0.954790898, -0.772192062, -0.878558604, -0.847823755 /
12075  data a2 / 1.316503941, 1.346260947, 1.643811116, 1.971809782, 2.231346853 /
12076  data a3 / -0.456399589, -0.898904451, -0.838833356, -0.988747707, -1.03656776 /
12077  data a4 / 0.050879024, 0.216757739, 0.23862625, 0.320862075, 0.359685226 /
12078  data a5 / -1.433196805, -1.43253025, -1.388659927, -1.351932734, -1.268368489 /
12079  data a6 / 0.287168587, 0.23487456, 0.220995941, 0.214671577, 0.232463154 /
12080  data a7 / 6.222079151, 6.393254173, 6.177291568, 6.114401188, 6.353461281 /
12081  data a8 / 0.006308985, 0.004963986, 0.007864319, 0.008599691, 0.007901766 /
12082  data a9 / 0.853827962, 0.791949454, 0.622792362, 0.509051162, 0.383062867 /
12083 
12084 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
12085  nper = 5
12086 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
12087  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
12088  period1 = period(1)
12089  a0t = a0(1)
12090  a1t = a1(1)
12091  a2t = a2(1)
12092  a3t = a3(1)
12093  a4t = a4(1)
12094  a5t = a5(1)
12095  a6t = a6(1)
12096  a7t = a7(1)
12097  a8t = a8(1)
12098  a9t = a9(1)
12099  goto 1011
12100  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
12101 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
12102  do i=2,nper-1
12103  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
12104  count1 = i
12105  count2 = i+1
12106  goto 1020
12107  endif
12108  enddo
12109  endif
12110 
12111 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
12112  write (*,*)
12113  write (*,*) 'PVNGS Common Model005 Horizontal'
12114  write (*,*) 'attenuation model is not defined for a '
12115  write (*,*) ' spectral period of: '
12116  write (*,'(a10,f10.5)') ' Period = ',spect
12117  write (*,*) 'This spectral period is outside the defined'
12118  write (*,*) 'period range in the code or beyond the range'
12119  write (*,*) 'of spectral periods for interpolation.'
12120  write (*,*) 'Please check the input file.'
12121  write (*,*)
12122  stop 99
12123 
12124 C Interpolate the coefficients for the requested spectral period.
12125  1020 call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a0(count1),a0(count2),
12126  + spect,a0t,iflag)
12127  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a1(count1),a1(count2),
12128  + spect,a1t,iflag)
12129  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a2(count1),a2(count2),
12130  + spect,a2t,iflag)
12131  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a3(count1),a3(count2),
12132  + spect,a3t,iflag)
12133  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a4(count1),a4(count2),
12134  + spect,a4t,iflag)
12135  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a5(count1),a5(count2),
12136  + spect,a5t,iflag)
12137  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a6(count1),a6(count2),
12138  + spect,a6t,iflag)
12139  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a7(count1),a7(count2),
12140  + spect,a7t,iflag)
12141  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a8(count1),a8(count2),
12142  + spect,a8t,iflag)
12143  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a9(count1),a9(count2),
12144  + spect,a9t,iflag)
12145 
12146  1011 period1 = spect
12147 
12148 C Set Constant Terms
12149  mref1 = 5.5
12150  mref2 = 6.5
12151 
12152 C Compute the ground motion for the given spectral period.
12153  if (m .lt. mref1) then
12154  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rjb
12155  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
12156  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
12157  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
12158  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
12159  else
12160  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
12161  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
12162  endif
12163 
12164 C Add Ztor term
12165  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
12166 
12167  sigma = 0.65
12168 
12169 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
12170  lny = lny + 4.6052
12171 
12172  period2 = period1
12173 
12174  return
12175  end
12176 
12177 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
12178  Subroutine pvngs_common006 ( m, Rjb, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
12179 
12180  implicit none
12181 
12182  integer MAXPER
12183  parameter(maxper=5)
12184  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
12185  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
12186  real Mref1, MRef2, Rjb, Ztor
12187  REAL M, specT, sigma, period1, period2, lnY
12188  REAL a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T, a7T, a8T, a9T
12189  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
12190 
12191  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
12192  data a0 / 4.86597378, 6.144703681, 5.121782642, 4.387039752, 3.546300844 /
12193  data a1 / -0.273088209, -0.63407702, -0.57547517, -1.041151272, -1.146959743 /
12194  data a2 / 0.933580946, 0.971192248, 1.407326375, 1.760001089, 2.024389433 /
12195  data a3 / -0.432606019, -0.69651455, -0.686341995, -1.028830191, -1.126268348 /
12196  data a4 / 0.003161612, 0.078029949, 0.139172231, 0.295446332, 0.373856164 /
12197  data a5 / -1.72560986, -1.804855901, -1.538783528, -1.317089532, -1.217781747 /
12198  data a6 / 0.337828643, 0.376147478, 0.342958148, 0.345931625, 0.334376914 /
12199  data a7 / 7.371186735, 7.239836089, 7.415332136, 7.5134082, 7.43850092 /
12200  data a8 / 0.018197929, 0.005151621, 0.003784379, 0.006872836, 0.008972623 /
12201  data a9 / 0.659007193, 0.658493883, 0.564530063, 0.481921424, 0.45283348 /
12202 
12203 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
12204  nper = 5
12205 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
12206  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
12207  period1 = period(1)
12208  a0t = a0(1)
12209  a1t = a1(1)
12210  a2t = a2(1)
12211  a3t = a3(1)
12212  a4t = a4(1)
12213  a5t = a5(1)
12214  a6t = a6(1)
12215  a7t = a7(1)
12216  a8t = a8(1)
12217  a9t = a9(1)
12218  goto 1011
12219  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
12220 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
12221  do i=2,nper-1
12222  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
12223  count1 = i
12224  count2 = i+1
12225  goto 1020
12226  endif
12227  enddo
12228  endif
12229 
12230 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
12231  write (*,*)
12232  write (*,*) 'PVNGS Common Model006 Horizontal'
12233  write (*,*) 'attenuation model is not defined for a '
12234  write (*,*) ' spectral period of: '
12235  write (*,'(a10,f10.5)') ' Period = ',spect
12236  write (*,*) 'This spectral period is outside the defined'
12237  write (*,*) 'period range in the code or beyond the range'
12238  write (*,*) 'of spectral periods for interpolation.'
12239  write (*,*) 'Please check the input file.'
12240  write (*,*)
12241  stop 99
12242 
12243 C Interpolate the coefficients for the requested spectral period.
12244  1020 call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a0(count1),a0(count2),
12245  + spect,a0t,iflag)
12246  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a1(count1),a1(count2),
12247  + spect,a1t,iflag)
12248  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a2(count1),a2(count2),
12249  + spect,a2t,iflag)
12250  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a3(count1),a3(count2),
12251  + spect,a3t,iflag)
12252  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a4(count1),a4(count2),
12253  + spect,a4t,iflag)
12254  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a5(count1),a5(count2),
12255  + spect,a5t,iflag)
12256  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a6(count1),a6(count2),
12257  + spect,a6t,iflag)
12258  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a7(count1),a7(count2),
12259  + spect,a7t,iflag)
12260  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a8(count1),a8(count2),
12261  + spect,a8t,iflag)
12262  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a9(count1),a9(count2),
12263  + spect,a9t,iflag)
12264 
12265  1011 period1 = spect
12266 
12267 C Set Constant Terms
12268  mref1 = 5.5
12269  mref2 = 6.5
12270 
12271 C Compute the ground motion for the given spectral period.
12272  if (m .lt. mref1) then
12273  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rjb
12274  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
12275  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
12276  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
12277  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
12278  else
12279  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
12280  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
12281  endif
12282 
12283 C Add Ztor term
12284  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
12285 
12286  sigma = 0.65
12287 
12288 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
12289  lny = lny + 4.6052
12290 
12291  period2 = period1
12292 
12293  return
12294  end
12295 
12296 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
12297  Subroutine pvngs_common007 ( m, Rjb, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
12298 
12299  implicit none
12300 
12301  integer MAXPER
12302  parameter(maxper=5)
12303  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
12304  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
12305  real Mref1, MRef2, Rjb, Ztor
12306  REAL M, specT, sigma, period1, period2, lnY
12307  REAL a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T, a7T, a8T, a9T
12308  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
12309 
12310  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
12311  data a0 / 4.844064933, 4.219255167, 3.534385513, 2.390354801, 1.425024701 /
12312  data a1 / -0.013603504, 1.979574394, 1.30292675, 1.497138325, 1.614937219 /
12313  data a2 / 1.202808487, 1.433566727, 1.740947454, 2.051187409, 2.385760131 /
12314  data a3 / -0.35672112, 1.183323761, 0.799970466, 0.870581461, 0.817881028 /
12315  data a4 / 0.062790933, -0.323330263, -0.2067445, -0.202118326, -0.156815452 /
12316  data a5 / -1.583046448, -1.617499558, -1.355705253, -1.187049421, -1.075971196 /
12317  data a6 / 0.265085563, 0.209670811, 0.240965815, 0.247088498, 0.284635387 /
12318  data a7 / 6.825562193, 7.368990249, 6.643172818, 6.268347176, 6.622314026 /
12319  data a8 / 0.02113002, 0.013027428, 0.016359414, 0.005601114, 0.022644438 /
12320  data a9 / 1.120855977, 0.984636607, 0.582038379, 0.381242215, 0.172633025 /
12321 
12322 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
12323  nper = 5
12324 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
12325  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
12326  period1 = period(1)
12327  a0t = a0(1)
12328  a1t = a1(1)
12329  a2t = a2(1)
12330  a3t = a3(1)
12331  a4t = a4(1)
12332  a5t = a5(1)
12333  a6t = a6(1)
12334  a7t = a7(1)
12335  a8t = a8(1)
12336  a9t = a9(1)
12337  goto 1011
12338  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
12339 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
12340  do i=2,nper-1
12341  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
12342  count1 = i
12343  count2 = i+1
12344  goto 1020
12345  endif
12346  enddo
12347  endif
12348 
12349 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
12350  write (*,*)
12351  write (*,*) 'PVNGS Common Model007 Horizontal'
12352  write (*,*) 'attenuation model is not defined for a '
12353  write (*,*) ' spectral period of: '
12354  write (*,'(a10,f10.5)') ' Period = ',spect
12355  write (*,*) 'This spectral period is outside the defined'
12356  write (*,*) 'period range in the code or beyond the range'
12357  write (*,*) 'of spectral periods for interpolation.'
12358  write (*,*) 'Please check the input file.'
12359  write (*,*)
12360  stop 99
12361 
12362 C Interpolate the coefficients for the requested spectral period.
12363  1020 call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a0(count1),a0(count2),
12364  + spect,a0t,iflag)
12365  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a1(count1),a1(count2),
12366  + spect,a1t,iflag)
12367  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a2(count1),a2(count2),
12368  + spect,a2t,iflag)
12369  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a3(count1),a3(count2),
12370  + spect,a3t,iflag)
12371  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a4(count1),a4(count2),
12372  + spect,a4t,iflag)
12373  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a5(count1),a5(count2),
12374  + spect,a5t,iflag)
12375  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a6(count1),a6(count2),
12376  + spect,a6t,iflag)
12377  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a7(count1),a7(count2),
12378  + spect,a7t,iflag)
12379  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a8(count1),a8(count2),
12380  + spect,a8t,iflag)
12381  call interp (period(count1),period(count2),a9(count1),a9(count2),
12382  + spect,a9t,iflag)
12383 
12384  1011 period1 = spect
12385 
12386 C Set Constant Terms
12387  mref1 = 5.5
12388  mref2 = 6.5
12389 
12390 C Compute the ground motion for the given spectral period.
12391  if (m .lt. mref1) then
12392  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-mref1)**2.0 + a2t*(m-mref1) + a1t*(mref1-mref2) + a8t*rjb
12393  1 + (a5t+a6t*(mref1-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
12394  elseif (m .ge. mref2) then
12395  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a3t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
12396  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
12397  else
12398  lny = a0t - a4t*(8.5-m)**2.0 + a1t*(m-mref2) + a8t*rjb
12399  1 + (a5t+a6t*(m-mref2))*alog(sqrt(a7t*a7t+rjb*rjb))
12400  endif
12401 
12402 C Add Ztor term
12403  lny = lny + (a9t*ztor)/20.0
12404 
12405  sigma = 0.65
12406 
12407 C Convert ground motion to units of gals in natural log units.
12408  lny = lny + 4.6052
12409 
12410  period2 = period1
12411 
12412  return
12413  end
12414 
12415 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
12416  Subroutine pvngs_common008 ( m, Rjb, ztor, specT, lnY, sigma, iflag )
12417 
12418  implicit none
12419 
12420  integer MAXPER
12421  parameter(maxper=5)
12422  REAL Period(maxper), a0(maxper), a1(maxper), a2(maxper), a3(maxper)
12423  REAL a4(maxper), a5(maxper), a6(maxper), a7(maxper), a8(maxper), a9(maxper)
12424  real Mref1, MRef2, Rjb, Ztor, M, specT, sigma
12425  REAL a0T, a1T, a2T, a3T, a4T, a5T, a6T, a7T, a8T, a9T
12426  REAL period1, period2, lnY
12427  integer iflag, count1, count2, nPer, i
12428 
12429  data period / 0.01, 0.2, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0 /
12430  data a0 / 5.196560414, 6.3779206, 6.168012597, 5.517927695, 4.200672553 /
12431  data a1 / -0.958403233, -1.190198693, -1.180296464, -0.679274321, -0.548498253 /
12432  data a2 / 1.443974775, 1.496178834, 1.850791466, 2.233309216, 2.488066584 /
12433  data a3 / -0.916984325, -1.007081241, -1.132443605, -0.927758145, -0.977157301 /
12434  data a4 / 0.144335529, 0.282672806, 0.362298721, 0.349558379, 0.330438663 /
12435  data a5 / -1.653295478, -1.560264395, -1.579320126, -1.609819791, -1.421728556 /
12436  data a6 / 0.295382242, 0.176595264, 0.160706414, 0.134372763, 0.184743563 /
12437  data a7 / 6.458555302, 6.77949456, 6.042271361, 5.885029003, 6.302790569 /
12438  data a8 / 0.011468897, 0.004122242, 0.01291962, 0.022350743, 0.024469094 /
12439  data a9 / 0.742172335, 0.639057402, 0.56151272, 0.548360683, 0.431827383 /
12440 
12441 C Find the requested spectral period and corresponding coefficients
12442  nper = 5
12443 C First check for the PGA case (i.e., specT=0.0)
12444  if (spect .eq. 0.0) then
12445  period1 = period(1)
12446  a0t = a0(1)
12447  a1t = a1(1)
12448  a2t = a2(1)
12449  a3t = a3(1)
12450  a4t = a4(1)
12451  a5t = a5(1)
12452  a6t = a6(1)
12453  a7t = a7(1)
12454  a8t = a8(1)
12455  a9t = a9(1)
12456  goto 1011
12457  elseif (spect .gt. 0.0) then
12458 C Now loop over the spectral period range of the attenuation relationship.
12459  do i=2,nper-1
12460  if (spect .ge. period(i) .and. spect .le. period(i+1) ) then
12461  count1 = i
12462  count2 = i+1
12463  goto 1020
12464  endif
12465  enddo
12466  endif
12467 
12468 C Selected spectral period is outside range defined by attenuaton model.
12469  write (*,*)
12470  write (*,*) 'PVNGS Common Model008 Horizontal'
